explains: n. 非法交易（尤指毒品买卖）
vi. 交易（traffic 的现在分词）
wordGroup: drug trafficking 贩毒；毒品走私

sentences.en: I have never engaged in drug trafficking.
sentences.cn: 我从来没有从事过贩毒。

sentences.en: The travel company is just a front for drug trafficking.
sentences.cn: 这家旅行社不过是毒品交易的掩护场所。

sentences.en: He was sentenced to ten years in prison on charges of drug trafficking.
sentences.cn: 他被指控贩毒，被判10年徒刑。
